revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Planet |model=VC-230N |revision= |asin= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_len=10 |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed=384 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29VL320BB |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L128168A |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=VDSL2 DTM Chip;Metanoia;MT2301;;1; ,,, VDSL2 AFE (Analog Front End);Metanoia;MT3301;;1; |flags=VDSL2 |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:30:4F |oui_eth=00:30:4F }} {{TagLine|802.11n Wireless VDSL2 Router}} :[http://www.planet.com.tw/en/product/product_ov.php?id=26688 Product page] â€¢ [http://www.planet.com.tw/en/product/images/26688/EM-VC230_230N_v2.pdf Manual]
This device uses a ''Metanoia'' MT2301 (''Merlin'') VDSL DMT :and MT3301 AFE combo for the VDSL2 modem portion.
The manual shows sample MACs with OUIs of 00:30:4F (''PLANET'').
==Images== <gallery caption="from Planet"> File:Planet VC-230N.jpg|main </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]]
